name: Cappuccino
description: A coffee drink known for its creamy texture and smooth, balanced flavor. This coffee beverage is made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam on top.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves. Simple yet delicious!

name: Chocolate Cake
description: A moist and decadent chocolate cake layered with rich chocolate ganache. Perfect for chocolate lovers!

name: Paneer Tikka
description: A popular Indian appetizer made with marinated paneer (Indian cottage cheese) and grilled to perfection. Served with mint chutney.

name: Caesar Salad
description: A classic salad made with romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing. A refreshing and healthy choice.

name: Mango Smoothie
description: A refreshing and tropical smoothie made with fresh mangoes, yogurt, and a hint of lime. Perfect for a hot summer day.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with spaghetti, eggs, pancetta, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper. Creamy and flavorful!

name: Sushi Roll
description: A delicious Japanese dish made with vinegared rice, fresh seafood or vegetables, and wrapped in seaweed. A must-try for sushi lovers!
